name: fullstack-todo-react
description: This is a fullstack project that consists of a backend and a frontend, both using TypeScript.

scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && tsc
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start
